ModMetaData.name: Lord of the Rims CE Patch
ModMetaData.author: Saebbi
ModMetaData.description:
Patches the Lord of the Rims mods to work with Combat Extended. Automatically detects installed modules and makes them compatible.
NOTE: This version was made for the CE Fork by InsertKey and may require an update when the official CE 1.0 version is released.
